mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.kaoqin_types as kaoqinTypes ,a.kaoqin_content as kaoqinContent ,a.kaoqin_time as kaoqinTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM kaoqin a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.kaoqin_types = #{params.kaoqinTypes}
and a.kaoqin_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoqinContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.kaoqin_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.kaoqinTimeEnd})
and a.kaoqin_time = #{params.kaoqinTime}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.insert_time = #{params.insertTime}
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.bumen_id = #{params.bumenId}
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
